original_text: And when thou hast seen it, thou also shalt be gathered unto thy people, as Aaron thy brother was gathered.
korean_text: 본 후에는 네 형 아론이 돌아간 것 같이 너도 조상에게로 돌아가리니

sentences.original_text: And when thou hast seen it
thou also shalt be gathered unto thy people
sentences.korean_translation: 너도 네 백성에게로 모이게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: as Aaron thy brother was gathered
